name: Halloween: Funny Pumpkins
description:
Halloween is a funny fest for all the family, for kids and adults! What could be funnier than to take on clothes like monsters or ghosts and take part in the masquerade of unbelievable monsters? What could be more interesting than run through the streets, frighten strangers, tell frightening stories to friends, and, of course, collect sweets? Halloween is full of funny tasks, it brings happiness and fun to all its participants. And we couldn’t miss such an exciting holiday. This time our interactive family story will be even funnier and even more interesting than ever. There is going to be a lot of arcades, puzzles and action!

Today we are going to tell you our special frightening stories! But they are not going to frighten you, but, on contrary, bring fun and pleasure! You will get to know the story, which has happened with Hippo and her little brother Ji at the very end of Halloween fest, when masquerade is completely over. It seems, that all the interesting and funny tasks are over, but suddenly, just on the street, the magic door to the world, where all the possible and impossible monsters live, is open for Hippo. While Hippo and Ji are puzzled and don’t know what to do, monsters steal their sweets! But Hippy and Ji are not going to give up! They are ready to go to the monster land and bring back their sweets. And not to stuck in this land forever, Hippy and Ji must come back till the last pumpkin on the streets of the town gets dark. From this moment on starts our adventure! Help kids to go through a special mine field, where every mine is a furious sleeping pumpkin. Feed caramel monster and it will produce a lot of sweets. Cure a huge pumpkin head, and collect with a vacuum cleaner all the ghosts happening on your way! Our interactive story contains an exciting arcade, crafty puzzles, clever jokes, and overwhelming action! Are you ready for unbelievable adventures? Then welcome to the land of Forever Halloween! A-ha-ha-ha-ha! Haven’t you already frightened?..

Hippo adventures in the forever Halloween land is an interesting interactive story with educational elements, which is suitable for both kids and their parents. Moreover, this new game, as well as all our games is absolutely for free! Stay tuned, stay with us, and have fun playing our free kids and family games with your relatives!
developers: Hippo Baby Games for Girls and for Boys
